title: Christmas Treats ~ Snowballs, No bake Rum Balls, Sugar Cookies & Zebra Cake
content:
Gift wrapped Christmas goodies ~ Christmas greeting cards made by Nehal

Wishing all my readers, visitors and friends a Merry Christmas! May you and your families have a wonderful holiday season. 

 Snowballs aka Russian tea cakes & No bake Rum Balls Sugar Cookies & Zebra Cake

I am leaving you with a few Christmas goodies to whet your holiday appetite. Will be posting the recipes at Kids Zone over the next few days.
